summary:
Adds a craftable poleaxe to the game. The weapon is suitable for all situations.
A recommended weapon by all the leading Stormcloak Officers!
Adventurers can use it too I guess...
descriptionHtml:
Another weapon of the iron variety by TheNerevar.
Again, I like the iron tier weapons because they fit so well with the game.

Weapon stats:
Swings at a speed between the Battleaxe and Warhammer
Does the damage between a Greatsword and a Battleaxe
Ignores 60% of an opponent's armour rather it's heavy or light.

The Poleaxe:
Usually the poleaxe (I'm guessing 15c) was this longish polearm, the head of it was a combination of and axe, hammer, and spike.
The spike at the top was for spiking.
The axe was for axing.
The hammer for hammering.
And so on...

Poleaxes have a chance to spawn on Stormcloak soldiers and it's a preferred weapon for Galmar Stone-Fist.
Should not conflict with leveled lists since it uses it's own.
This weapon is craftable and temperable

Recommended mods:
Polearm and two handed spear animations by h1zchan
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53455/?

That mod replaces the idle attack animation for battleaxes/warhammers/polearms with a thrusting attack.
Looks really nice and definitely fits for any halberd type weapon out there.

Enjoy!
author: TheNerevar
